title: Emotional Labor Management Strategies in Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Over three years of online education experience and experience in operating secondary-level curricula
context.additional_context: In-service secondary education practitioners responsible for online training operations within corporate settings

learning_goals: Identify and explain three or more elements of educators' emotional labor during online interactions
Apply emotion regulation strategies in text-based communication to real-life scenarios through role-playing exercises
Practice intonation and speaking techniques to enhance emotional presence in voice-based online classes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
